name: Flappypatrickio
body:
#HTML5 CSS-based Game
This game project has the following:

*1280x720 pixel game canvas.
*All positions and sizes defined using a 10px em.
*A simple game loop which calculates delta and can be started and stopped.
*A player entity which can jump up when mouse is clicked or space bar is pressed.
*A "Game Over" screen when player touches the ground or the obstacles. There you can see the highscore and restart the game.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
